narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This first pre-license inspection for a Class A License and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
The license fee in the amount of $350.00 will be submitted by the applicant to the following address:

2150 Centre Avenue
Building B, Mail Stop 3W11
